timeline.bodyText: This should have %Azure.Core applied as well
timeline.author: joshfree

timeline.bodyText: This can have %Azure.Identity for now, and can be changed to a %Common label when additional end-to-end tests are created in the future
timeline.author: joshfree

timeline.bodyText: @jialindai can you confirm that this should be auto-labeled with https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/labels/azure-spring-data-cosmos ?
timeline.author: joshfree

replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText: Should we add a tag for tracing? If not we should use Core for this.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Your call 🙂. What would help more?
replies.author: AlexGhiondea

replies.bodyText: Tracing and core don't always go hand in hand for Java, I think it would make sense to add a tag for tracing specifically.
replies.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Is there a label for tracing already?
replies.author: AlexGhiondea

replies.bodyText:
I think we used Monitor label, but don't know if that would still be the correct one.
cc: @joshfree
replies.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText:
For azure-core-tracing we've converged on using azure-core for all the languages.
Monitor is going to be used for Monitor Exporter and Monitor Track 2 SDKs
replies.author: joshfree

replies.bodyText: Thanks @joshfree! I'll go ahead and update this.
replies.author: AlexGhiondea

timeline.bodyText: Could we have the label azure-spring for PRs related to spring?
timeline.author: saragluna
